problem.markdown:
>>Which of the following concepts can be modeled using a PPC? <<
( ) Prices that the goods will sell for will be determined in a market ( ) Societies have preferences about what should be produced ( ) Governments, rather than markets, are more efficient allocators of resources (x) When all resources are being used, making more of one good means making less of the other good. ( ) A society can produce more of any good just by reallocating its resources more efficiently
